title: changing windows display scale causes a crash
body:
steps to reproduce:
1. start alacritty
2. minimize alacritty
3. change windows display scale
4. bringing alacritty back will cause the crash

### System

OS: Windows
Version: `alacritty 0.12.1 (5fdfd47)`
